subject: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf.  Th
body:
I am Mr Charles w. Scharf.  The Chief Executive officer in WELLs FARGO BANK..
This is to notify you that the United Nations Secretary General has
deliberated with the world bank for a compensation payment on scammed
victims from Asia, America and Europe so your name emerged as one of
the lucky beneficiaries. I write to let  you know that the sum of
$10,000,000 (ten Million United States Dollars) Only has been approved
in your favor.
Simply contact me with your  full Bank details for the transfer of your funds.
if you dont want to receive it through transfer then you have to chose how you
want to receive it,
Email to contact, 
wellsfargobank246810@gmail.com
ATM CARD
BANK CHEQUE
 
CONSIGNMENT BOX

subject: Re: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf.  Th
body:
Hello Mr. Charles W. Scharf,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate you notifying me about the United Nations Secretary General's initiative to help scammed victims from different regions.

I'm definitely interested in learning more about how I can receive the approved sum of ten million United States Dollars. However, before proceeding, I have a few questions:

1. Could you please provide more details about the process and requirements for receiving the funds through each of the options mentioned (email transfer, ATM card, bank cheque, or box)?
2. What are the associated costs or fees involved in each method of receiving the funds?
3. Is there any specific timeline within which I need to provide my full bank details or make a decision on how to receive the funds?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Louise

subject: Re: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf. Th
Re: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf. Th
body:
Hello Mr. Charles W. Scharf,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you and your family are doing well too. I appreciate you giving me the choice on how I want to receive the funds. It's good to have options.

Could you please provide me with more details about each option? I would like to understand them better before making a decision. How does the bank-to-bank transfer work? And what are the benefits of receiving the funds through an ATM card or a bank cheque? Lastly, could you explain what you mean by "box"?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Louise

subject: Re: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf. Th
body:
Well I don't have much to say but I want you to know that Bank to Bank
transfer simply means I can transfer this your funds from our Bank to your
own Bank Account. 2) ATM simply means that you will have your money loaded
in an ATM card and you can be withdrawing your money from the ATM Machine.
3) consignment Box mean when we give you a Box contains with your total
funds.

MR. Charles W. Scharf.

subject: Re: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf. Th
body:
Hello Mr. Charles W. Scharf,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your explanation of Bank to Bank transfer, ATM, and Box. It's interesting to learn about different ways to access and transfer funds.

Could you please tell me more about the process of transferring funds from one bank account to another? How long does it usually take for the transfer to be completed? Are there any fees involved in this type of transaction?

Also, I'm curious about the security measures in place when using an ATM card. How can I ensure that my money is safe when withdrawing cash from an ATM machine?

Lastly, could you elaborate on what exactly is contained in the Box that you mentioned? Is it a physical box or something else?

Thank you for taking the time to answer my questions. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Louise

subject: Re: I am Mr Charles w. Scharf. Th
body:
Good day to you how are you doing today?
Well. The Bank to Bank transfer can only be proceed When you send me your
Bank Details for the transferring of this your funds to you Bank Account.
2) ATM card your Total money will be loaded in an ATM card for you and you
will be withdrawing your money from the ATM Machine whenever you like. 3)
Box can only be physical cash so you will receive this your funds with cash
in Box.

MR. Charles W. AScharf

body:
